alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Jessamine; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:30AM EDT until July 18 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN WOODFORD...JESSAMINE AND WEST CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 329 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located from 7 miles south of Versailles to near Nicholasville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Nicholasville, Wilmore, Jessamine, Mortonsville, Union Mills, Troy, and Pinckard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
